body:
Can you add a comment to grpc.mak.template explaining the filter for which
tests go in and which get excluded?

On Tue, May 5, 2015, 6:14 PM Nicolas Noble notifications@github.com wrote:

> nicolasnoble wants to merge 1 commit into grpc:master from
> 
> ## nicolasnoble:building-win32-tests:
> 
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
> 
>   https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/1485
> Commit Summary
> - Making the gRPC C tests building under Windows.
>
